{{Description|Dear Travelers:<br />The new event wish "Epitome Invocation" is about to begin!<br />Time to stock up on weapons and characters to make your party stronger in combat!<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1310557368183328769 Official Announcement]</ref>}}

During this event wish, the 5-star weapons [[Aquila Favonia]] (Sword) and [[Amos' Bow]] (Bow) as well as 4-star weapons [[The Flute]] (Sword), [[The Bell]] (Claymore), [[The Widsith]] (Catalyst), [[The Stringless]] (Bow), and [[Favonius Lance]] (Polearm) will get a huge drop-rate boost!<ref>Based on in-game description</ref>

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
